test.sentence: Please implement the getAuthorEmail method - it should return a valid email that can be used to contact the author of the stragety.
Please implement the getAuthorEmail method - it should return a valid email that can be used to contact the author of the stragety, not null.
Please implement the getAuthorEmail method - it should return a valid email that can be used to contact the author of the stragety, not an empty string.
